name: Create Darkness
description: You remove all intensities of natural light in the targeted zone.

name: Induce Fear
description: All entities within the area must make a SR Check. A target can choose to fail the Resistance Check.

description.name: DoF 1+
entries: The target is unable to harm any entity within the zone. The target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed. The spell does not stop affecting an entity if it leaves the zone, but remember that the spell only prevents harm to other entities within the zone. For example, a target could not break down a door or step on a spider within the zone. Similarly, an arrow that fails the Resistance Check cannot harm anything in the zone.
The one exception is an entity can continue to cook and consume food and drink that has already been harvested or prepared.

description: All entities in an area centered on you must make a SR or MR Check; a target can choose to fail.
A target that fails the Resistance Check gains the Fear: Shaken state, with you as the object of fear. This Fear state does not stack with any other Fear.
The effects of this spell last until the End Phase.

name: See in Darkness
description: Choose a number of entities whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value. A target gains Natural Dark Vision feature.

effect: Targets can also see in supernatural darkness

name: Dark Barrier
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. This barrier possess the Imbued trait. Attacks using the Light Damage Type deal twice as much damage to the barrier.

effect: The barrier is immune to attacks using the Physical Damage Group that do not have the [@trait Imbued @] trait.

name: Concealing Shadow
description: You gain a power bonus to Stealth Checks. This power bonus also applies to Magic Appraisal Checks make to hide your mana.

name: Armor of Darkness
description: You gain a natural AV against Force and Darkness Damage Types and half as much against the Physical and Elemental Damage Groups.

name: Rebuke Light
description: All light elementals in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a SR Check.
A target that fails the Resistance Check takes 20 points of Force Damage per Degree of Failure. A target with the Rex Damage Role multiplies the damage by their Rex Multiplier.
This spell also prevents any natural light within area.

name: Hide Mana
description: Choose a spell or a supernatural quality of an entity. Any Magic Appraisal Check made to detect or measure the target suffers a power penalty. Attempts to detect this spell also suffer the power penalty.

name: Shadow Beam
description: You make an Offensive Roll against an entity. On a hit, the target takes Darkness Damage with the listed Base Damage.

name: Zone of Darkness
description: You create a stationary zone centered on a point of your choice. All entities within the zone increase the difficulty of any Detect Spirit or sight based Difficulty Skill check by two degrees. Perception Checks suffer a -4 deed penalty. Detection powers affecting an entity within the zone reduce the Resistance Check by 4.

name: Chains of Shadow
description: You make a Trap maneuver against an entity. The Opposed Characteristic Check uses the listed Strength.
The chains are material and have the Imbued trait and a Fortitude of 25 but can only be broken by an object with the Imbued trait.

name: Control Darkness
description: You gain the following actions:

description.name: Control Creature of Darkness
entries: You can gain control over a darkness elemental. A target must make a SR Check. A target that succeeds is immune to the control from this spell for a number of rounds equal to their Degree of Success.
Failure means the target falls under your control. This control is active, meaning you must spend AP to make the target perform actions.

A target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure on the previous Check. If the target ever leaves the area or the spell ends, your control ends.

description.name: Modify Darkness
entries: You can change the shape of a darkness.

description.name: Redirect Darkness
entries: You can take this reaction when an attack using Darkness Damage passes through the area, it suffers `D2` on the Offensive Roll.

name: Concealment
description: An entity of your choice gains a power bonus to Resistance Checks against detection powers and to Conceal Spirit Checks.

name: Obfuscate
description: An entity of your choice can use the listed Final Skill Value for Stealth and Conceal Spirit Checks.

name: Enrage
description: All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a Defensive Roll against your Offensive Roll. On a hit, a target must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.
A target that fails the Resistance Check gains a +1 deed bonus to Offensive Rolls but suffers a -3 deed penalty to all other Skill Checks.

name: Banish Positive Emotions
description: All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a Defensive Roll against your Offensive Roll. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check; a target can choose to fail.
A target that fails the Resistance Check suppress the any positive emotions, such as joy, friendship, and inner peace.
The effects of this spell last one minute per Degree of Failure. The effects of this spell do not require maintenance.

name: Night
description: You create a stationary zone centered on a point of your choice. The zone is filled with natural darkness. All entities, except you, looking through the darkness apply the Totally Blind state unless they make an Inhuman (32) Notice Check or Almost Impossible (24) Search Check, in which case a target applies the Partially Blind state until the End Phase.
You are not affected

name: Seeking Shadow
description: You make an Offensive Roll against an entity. On a hit, a target takes Darkness Damage with the listed Base Damage and disappears.
If the target dodges, the spell can make another Offensive Roll on your turn next round by taking the [@action Use an Active Power action @]. If the target blocks, the sphere disappears.
You can choose to stop controlling the sphere. It will then act on its own Final Initiative Roll of 0 and any Offensive Roll the sphere makes uses the listed Final Roll Value.
If you stop maintaining the spell, the sphere disappears.

name: Zone of Concealment
description: You create a stationary zone centered on a point of your choice. Any entity within the zone gains a deed bonus to Resistance Checks against detection powers. Any Skill Check make with Detect Spirit or Magic Appraisal Check to locate magic suffers a deed penalty.

name: Enter Another's Nightmare
description: You make an Offensive Roll against a dreaming entity. On a hit, a target must make a SR or MR Check.
A target that fails the Resistance Check has their nightmare invaded by you.
You physically enter the nightmare of a creature within the listed range. You have no control over the nightmare and anything that happens there will be real for you.

A target must have a terrible dream to be affect by this spell. When you stop maintaining the spell or the target wakes up, dies, or has their nightmare become a dream you are returned to the material plane next to the target.

While you are in a nightmare, you can jump to the nightmare of another creature within the listed range of the target. The new target must make a SR or MR Check. If they succeed, you stay in your current nightmare.

Once a target succeeds the Resistance Check, they are immune to the spell until they wake up and fall asleep again. If you enter a nightmare that overlaps with the Veil, you do not return to the material plane when the spell ends.

name: Shadow Form
description: An entity of your choice transforms into pure shadow. The target gains the Immaterial and Imbued traits and can choose to interact with material entities at will. The target also gains a power bonus Stealth Checks and half that to Resistance Checks against darkness-based powers but doubles the Final Damage from any attack using the Light Damage Type.

effect: As intermediate degree but the Resistance Check bonus applies to all Resistance Checks not against light-based powers
As advanced degree but the target does not take additional damage from Light Damage

name: Bane
description: You create a zone centered on you. All entities within the zone must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail
A target that fails the Resistance Check suffers Disadvantage on their Skill and Resistance Checks; a target cannot be affected by more than one Bane spell.

name: Create Negative Feeling
description: You create a stationary zone centered on a point of your choice. All entities within the zone must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.

A target that fails the Resistance Check is filled with negative feelings, such as hatred and fear. This does not apply any state by itself, but a target making a Resistance Check to prevent a Fear state suffers `D1`.
A target can repeat the Resistance Check after one day has passed.

name: Erase Traces
description: An entity of your choice has any trace that it was in the area erased. This eliminates any natural and unnatural sign that the target was here. This does not erase traces from time until cast at the advanced degree.

effect: Eliminate traces of the target in time.
As advanced, but you can erase traces of all activity in the whole area.

name: Shield from Positive Emotions
description: You create a stationary zone centered on a point of your choice. All light elementals and entities composed of positive emotions within the zone must make a SR Check.

A target that fails the Resistance Check takes 10 points of Atomic Damage per Degree of Failure and gains the [@state Pain (4) @] state. The Pain state lasts until a target leaves the zone. A target with the Rex Damage Role multiplies the damage by their Rex Multiplier.

The Resistance Check is only made the first time a target enters the zone each round or if it starts the Action Phase in the zone. A target can only be subject to [@state Pain (4) @] once from any Shield from Positive Emotions spell

name: Dark Gate
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. You also gain the Gate of Mana action.

description.name: Gate of Mana
entries: You can take this reaction when you obtain at least 1 Degree of Success on a Defensive Roll with a Dark Gate against a spell. You can make a Power Collision using the listed Base Damage. On a failure, the attacking spell dissipates into nothing.
On a success, you absorb half the Mana Cost of the attacking spell.

name: Devastate
description: You make an Offensive Roll against an entity. On a hit, a target must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.
A target that fails the Resistance Check gain one degree of Pain per Degree of Failure.
The effects of this spell last until you stop maintaining the spell. The target cannot repeat the Resistance Check.

name: Mark of Fear
description: You create a stationary terrifying pattern. All entities that looks at it while in the area of its effect must make a SR or MR Check; a target can choose to fail.

A target that fails the Resistance Check gains the Fear: Terror state, with the pattern being the object of fear. A target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure on the previous Check.
Once a target has passed the Resistance Check, they cannot be affected until a new Mark of Fear spell is cast.

name: Catastrophic Night
description: All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a Defensive Roll against your Offensive Roll. On a hit, a target takes Darkness Damage with the listed Base Damage.

name: Dark Material
description: You create an object whose Presence is no greater than the listed value. The object has the listed Quality.

name: Travel by Shadow
description: Choose a number of entities whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value. A target must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.
All targets that fails the Resistance Check are transport from one shadow to another, up to the listed distance away.
This spell fails if there is no shadow near you at the time of casting or if there is no shadows where you intend to end up.

name: Lord of Nightmares
description: The entity whose nightmare you are in must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail. On a failure, you gain control over the nightmare. You can modify the nightmare as if you were a Nornir 45 entity -- all other benefits of Nornir do not apply. If the nightmare becomes a dream, you instead have Nornir 30.
A target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of hours have passed equal to their Degree of Failure on the previous Check.
The spell ends when the target passes the SR Check or you leave the nightmare.

effect: If you are in the Veil and in an area of positive energy, you can control your surroundings as if it were a nightmare. Neutral areas and areas of positive energy use the reduced Nornir. This does not work if there is a creature with similar or greater levels of Nornir.

name: Create Creature of Darkness
description: You create a monad creature. The creature's level can be no greater than the listed value and must follow the rules for monad creatures. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creature is a darkness elemental with Nornir 20.

name: Concealment from Magic
description: An entity of your choice cannot be targeted by trigger spells of the listed degree unless the caster is in control of the spell, in which case treat it as an effect spell.
For example, you cannot be targeted by the Mark of Fear since the caster has no control over it. But a Flare spell can affect you if the caster makes an Offensive Roll against you.

name: Kingdom of Darkness
description: You create a stationary zone centered on a point of your choice. The zone is filled with natural darkness. While you are in the zone, you gain a +4 deed bonus to Resistance Checks against detection powers and any attempt to locate you requires an Inhuman (32) Notice Check, Inhuman (32) Detect Spirit Check, or Impossible (28) Search Check. If you perform the Accumulate For A Prepared Spell for a Darkness spell, you gain a +20 power bonus to your Mana Accumulation.
All entities, other than you, in the zone lose 10 mana and 1 ki each turn on the End Phase. Light elementals lose twice as much.
You can also use 5 feet of distance to step into the darkness and reappear anywhere else in the zone.

name: Undetectable
description: An entity of your choice is completely immune to certain detection powers and abilities.

effect: You are invisible to detection spells and phenoms
As base, you also are invisible to Detect Spirit and detection exploits
You are invisible to all detection powers
As advanced, you are also completely invisible to the natural senses

name: Prison of Shadow
description: You make an Offensive Roll against an entity. On a hit, a target must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.
A target that fails the Resistance Check is trapped in a pocket dimension which takes the form of a glass bead.

While the target is in the bead, they have no knowledge of what occurs outside. The effects of this spell do not allow for another Resistance Check. But the target can escape by attacking the world. The world uses the Rex Damage Role -- it has Absorption 10 and Regeneration 19 as well as the listed Life Points.

An entity outside the pocket dimension has no knowledge about what is within. An entity can attack the bead, which has the same characteristics as the world inside pocket dimension. The bead is immune to attacks that do not have the Imbued (18) trait. Like the target trapped within, an entity can attack the bead

effect: The prison cannot be broken from the inside

name: One with the Darkness
description: You enter a state of meditation in which your body becomes one with the darkness. You leave this world and travel to the Nexus to nourish yourself with the energies found there. While there, you are only aware of your own body; the passage of time is meaningless. Your Mana Recovery is multiplied by 10 and you gain a physical and spiritual Regeneration Value of 16. While there is no maintenance cost, you can remain in the nexus for the listed time, you can try to leave early but there is a 50% chance it will take you the entire time.

name: Dark Ascension
description: An entity of your choice gains the listed Nornir value and they gain the Divine feature.

name: Tenebrae Onslaught
description: All entities in an area centered on a point of your choice must make a Defensive Roll against your Offensive Roll. This attack has the [@state Flowing @] and [@state Immaterial (20) @] traits. On a hit, a target takes Light Damage with the listed Base Damage. If a target takes any damage, they must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.
A target that fails the Resistance Check has its body and soul destroyed completely.
This spell cannot select targets, even if another power would allow you to; everyone in the area, but you, is equally affected.
